testcase.purpose: Check if AudioSystem interface exist
Check if connect attribute of AudioSystem interface exist and type of function
Check if disconnect attribute of AudioSystem interface exist and type of function
Check if ondisconnected attribute of AudioSystem interface exist
Check if AudioSystemContext hvae volume_controls attribute with with proper type, and is readonly
Check if AudioSystemContext hvae main_output_volume_control attribute with with proper main_output_volume_control, and is readonly
Check if readonly attribute main_input_volume_control of AudioSystemContext interface exist and type of object
